title.rendered: TTE felicitates senior employee on his retirement

content.rendered: TTE felicitated its senior employee, Rajendra Kumar Verma, upon his retirement after nine years of service to the company. Core team members from the organization got together for a pleasant iftar gathering at Bombay Bungalows located in JBR Walk, Dubai, presenting Rajendra with a certification and a gift as a token of appreciation for his tenure with the company as the Trading Division Head. TTE wishes Rajendra Kumar Verma well for the next chapter in his life.
